== linux.conf.au Open Day 2008 ==

Following the success of the Open Day at the 2007 linux.conf.au, we are doing it again in 2008. See http://linux.conf.au/programme/open-day for details of the event.

=== Booth Plans ===

* Hopefully we'll have a decent sized table.
* CDs
* Stickers
* Pens? (courtesy of conference pack)
* 2 computers for demos
* 1 computer running https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LiveCDShareThisCD
